methods.description:
Get a simple description for this AggSpec.

:return: (java.lang.String) The description
methods.formula:
The formula to use to calculate output values from grouped input values.

:return: (java.lang.String) The formula
methods.of:
*Overload 1*  
  :param formula: java.lang.String
  :return: io.deephaven.api.agg.spec.AggSpecFormula
  
*Overload 2*  
  :param formula: java.lang.String
  :param paramToken: java.lang.String
  :return: io.deephaven.api.agg.spec.AggSpecFormula
methods.paramToken:
The formula parameter token to be replaced with the input column name for evaluation.

:return: (java.lang.String) The parameter token
methods.walk:
Glue method to deliver this AggSpec to a AggSpec.Visitor.

Note: Java generics information - <V extends io.deephaven.api.agg.spec.AggSpec.Visitor>

:param visitor: (V) - The visitor
:return: (V) The visitor

text:
Specifies an aggregation that applies a formula to each input group (as a Deephaven vector
 (io.deephaven.vector.Vector)) to produce the corresponding output value. Each input column name is substituted for
 the param token for evaluation.
